author: Brody Warner
description: Unusually a fresh muddled fruit cocktail that's stirred rather than shaken. This Valentine's Day cocktail is suitably pink and is garnished with a heart-shaped strawberry. (Apologies for the strawberry in our photo but early Feb is not the best time for strawberries in the UK.)
name: Tennessee Liplock

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE strawberries in base of stirring glass
Add next 3 ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with a splash of soda if so desired
